wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Morris (born 5 October 1963) is a former Welsh cricketer, who played in three Tests for England in 1991. He played county cricket for Glamorgan, captaining the county, and after several senior roles for the England and Wales Cricket Board he returned to Glamorgan as chief executive and director of cricket in August 2013.The cricket correspondent, Colin Bateman, described Morris as "a talented, easy-going cricketer".
